医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
无创脑刺激有望增强认知障碍患者的导航技能一项关于深部脑刺激的研究揭示了其对空间导航的影响，强调了衰老认知缺陷的潜在治疗途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Nonpressive-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-enhancing-navigation-skills-in-cognitive-impairment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Nonpressive-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-enhancing-navigation-skills-in-cognitive-impairment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b1b4924-e1b4-47de-b01c-1d98a0bd1921 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 07:29:00 -0500 Noninvasive brain stimulation shows promise for enhancing navigation skills in cognitive impairment
旨在改善睡眠和心理健康的医生新加班限制医生是医疗保健领域的重要组成部分，他们与其他医疗专业人员一起确保及时诊断、治疗和管理复杂的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-overtime-limits-for-physicians-aimed-at-improving-sleep-and-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-overtime-limits-for-physicians-aimed-at-improving-sleep-and-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b805b483-3778-424d-9355-e71ea9380cc9 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 07:18:45 -0500 New overtime limits for physicians aimed at improving sleep and mental health
减肥药索马鲁肽可缓解膝关节炎疼痛索马鲁肽显示出通过减轻疼痛和减轻体重来治疗膝骨关节炎的前景，为传统药物干预提供了安全的替代方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Weight-loss-drug-semaglutide-may-offer-relief-for-knee-arthritis-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Weight-loss-drug-semaglutide-may-offer-relief-for-knee-arthritis-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21c5c1b8-4b99-4cec-9812-b665a10f89c7 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 07:00:00 -0500 Weight loss drug semaglutide may offer relief for knee arthritis pain
脑震荡史被确定为孕产妇精神疾病的关键危险因素ICES 和多伦多大学的一项新研究显示，有脑震荡病史的人在分娩后出现严重心理健康问题的风险要高出 25%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Concussion-history-identified-as-key-risk-factor-for-maternal-mental-illness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Concussion-history-identified-as-key-risk-factor-for-maternal-mental-illness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3093afee-ec9c-4a41-b568-a58a7d73655a Mon, 04 Nov 2024 06:58:20 -0500 Concussion history identified as key risk factor for maternal mental illness
美国发现 22 种农药与前列腺癌发病率相关研究人员在美国发现了 22 种农药与前列腺癌的发病率始终相关，其中 4 种农药还与前列腺癌死亡率相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/22-pesticides-found-to-be-linked-with-prostate-cancer-incidence-in-the-United-States.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/22-pesticides-found-to-be-linked-with-prostate-cancer-incidence-in-the-United-States.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9497fb6e-0508-431e-bdc6-191d9a3a9152 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 06:41:01 -0500 22 pesticides found to be associated with prostate cancer incidence in the United States
研究将儿童超重与社会经济劣势联系起来在单亲率高、教育水平低、收入低和儿童贫困率高的地区，更多的儿童超重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Study-links-childhood-overweight-to-socioeconomic-disadvantage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Study-links-childhood-overweight-to-socioeconomic-disadvantage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94381f9b-68b3-4093-9164-14126eb5be9e Mon, 04 Nov 2024 06:32:00 -0500 Study links childhood overweight to socioeconomic disadvantage
研究强调安大略省癌症患者急诊室的利用率CMAJ（加拿大医学会杂志）上发表的一项新研究发现，在安大略省，大约三分之一的癌症患者在诊断前 90 天内前往急诊科 (ED) 就诊 https://www.cmaj.ca/lookup/doi /10.1503/cmaj.240952。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Study-highlights-emergency-department-utilization-among-cancer-病人-in-Ontario.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Study-highlights-emergency-department-utilization-among-cancer-病人-in-Ontario.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82a19d35-de8d-4d79-a387-30ae0a2cf5bf Mon, 04 Nov 2024 06:18:39 -0500 Study highlights emergency department utilization among cancer patients in Ontario
新研究确定了使用碳酸酐酶抑制剂治疗 tau蛋白病的潜在方法碳酸酐酶抑制剂显示出减少 tau 蛋白积累的潜力，为 tau 病等神经退行性疾病提供新的治疗途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-study-identizes-pottial-treatment-for-tauopathies-using-carbonic-anHydrase-inhibitors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-study-identizes-pottial-treatment-for-tauopathies-using-carbonic-anHydrase-inhibitors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4c0390a-a8bf-454e-8c5d-582544c99c67 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 06:09:00 -0500 New study identifies potential treatment for tauopathies using carbonic anhydrase inhibitors
脊髓灰质炎疫苗接种活动将在加沙面临挑战的情况下恢复脊髓灰质炎疫苗接种活动的第三阶段定于明天在加沙地带北部部分地区开始，该活动原定于 2024 年 10 月 23 日推迟，原因是缺乏准入和有保证的全面人道主义暂停、强烈轰炸和大规模疏散令。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Polio-vaccination-campaign-set-to-resume-amid-challenges-in-Gaza.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Polio-vaccination-campaign-set-to-resume-amid-challenges-in-Gaza.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b70e8995-232f-4962-99c3-3511be9f450f Mon, 04 Nov 2024 05:55:22 -0500 Polio vaccination campaign set to resume amidst challenges in Gaza
研究发现，铅暴露仍然对全球数百万人构成健康风险解决铅中毒对于公共卫生至关重要，因为它会导致认知能力下降和心血管问题，特别是对于弱势群体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Lead-exposure-still-poses-health-risks-for-millions-worldwide-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Lead-exposure-still-poses-health-risks-for-millions-worldwide-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50253290-b406-40e9-84a9-c9f08d07adfd Mon, 04 Nov 2024 05:41:00 -0500 Lead exposure still poses health risks for millions worldwide, study finds
